## Phase 1: Foundation & Core (Complete)

- [x] **T001** `feat` Fastify API scaffold (port 5009, CORS, health check) — Foundation
- [x] **T002** `feat` Repo service: monorepo path resolver — Foundation
- [x] **T003** `feat` Products service: auto-discover products, metadata, phase detection — FR-001
- [x] **T004** `feat` Products route: list, detail, docs browser, PDF export — FR-001
- [x] **T005** `feat` Agent service: scan .claude/agents/, parse agent definitions — FR-002
- [x] **T006** `feat` Agent route: list agents, agent detail — FR-002
- [x] **T007** `feat` Activity service: audit trail (JSONL) + git commits merge — FR-003
- [x] **T008** `feat` Infrastructure service: port registry + CI/CD pipeline scan — FR-004
- [x] **T009** `feat` Components service: shared packages discovery — FR-005
- [x] **T010** `feat` Invoke service: command execution sandbox with SSE streaming — FR-006
- [x] **T011** `feat` Overview route: executive dashboard KPIs — FR-007
- [x] **T012** `feat` React web app: Layout, 23 pages, useApi hook, Badge, StatCard — FR-007
